_header: It peases them that be wroth
Subjects: Christ, blood of; sermons, verse in
_description: Five virtues of Christ’s blood — five lines in a sermon for Passiontide translating the Latin text which precedes them

BodLatTheD1.First Lines: It pesys þom þat be wroth…
